description: Schema for a build-generated SDK manifest

atoms.description: The set of all atoms in the current manifest, forming a complete dependency graph

ids.description: IDs of the main atoms in this manifest (as opposed to dependencies)

domain.description: The group of atoms this atom belongs to (e.g. 'c', 'dart', etc...)

name.description: The name of this atom, unique within its domain

files.description: The files making up the atom

additionalProperties.description: The property name is the path of the file relative to the destination root of the atom; the value is the path to the source file

deps.description: The ids of the atoms this atom directly depends on

tags.description: A collection of potentially domain-specific metadata

gn-label.description: Label of the GN target that generated this atom
